description:
Law Matters is for anyone who is facing a legal situation or simply wants to become more informed about their legal rights. The course will be video oriented and by the conclusion of the course you will be able to master the following topics: How to fix your credit, How to start a legal case, How to avoid IRS penalties, How to save money on your taxes, What is the proper way to structure your new startup - LLC, Scorp, Ccorp, and how to apply for SSDI benefits.

Many issues may require the help of a qualified attorney. However, many legal matters can be resolved yourself.

There will be thirty minutes of content, so you can learn quite a bit in a few short sessions.

Some Testimonials: "G", female student at San Jose State "this is the best instructor I have had at State, and I'm not just sucking up." "L", female student Skillpath, "Mr. Silberman makes complex legal matters easy to understand and I learned so much in a very short time. I suggest everyone takes a class from him."
title: Law Matters
